price: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Nitunukie aliye miongoni mwa watenda mema.
footnotes: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Nipe dhuriya walio wema wa vitendo, wasimamie hii kazi ya wito kuwaitia watu kwako Wewe, baada yangu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
